TextView.android:text: Sheet K: Title Block - Immediate Reinstatement as a Minor Works at Traffic Light Controlled Roadway(Rev 1.0/Mar 15)
This sheet covers brief period operations on
the roadway at traffic lights where immediate
reinstatement is possible. Works in this
category can be carried out once the following
criteria are met and provided that safe
working methods are used.
Are there at least 2 operatives on site?
Are all operatives wearing Class III high
visibility clothing?
Is there clear visibility in all directions?
Including weather, and obstructions to view?
Is Immediate Reinstatement of the site
Does the traffic light sequence give an
All-Stop period for the work site?
Use Sheet 0 to select appropriate
traffic management plan, or refer
to your inspector.
Complete the works in a safe manner
during All-Stop period:
1. Wait for All-Stop pedestrian phase.
2. When safe to do so, walk out to work site
and start task.
3. Monitor the traffic lights at alll times.
4. When All-Stop period ends, leave the work
site immediately and return to safe location
5. Wait for All-Stop pedestrian period and
repeat procedure until task is complete.
